name: PokéPark Wii: Pikachu's Adventure
description:
Dive into a world of adventure in PokéPark Wii: Pikachu's Adventure.
Compete in a variety of exciting Attractions using the Wii Remote
controller. Try to beat your high score in each challenge! Interact with
and befriend some Pokémon by defeating them in Skill Games. Once you
befriend a Pokémon, you can compete in certain Attractions with them.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
